text: Florida Man is an Internet meme. It was first made popular in 2013. It refers to male people doing weird things in the U.S. state of Florida. Internet users usually submit links to news stories and articles about weird or strange crimes and other events happening in Florida. The story usually begins with the words "Florida Man..." followed by the main event of the story. For example: "Florida man breaks into jail to hang with friends." ==References== Category:Internet memes
title: Florida Man
